Text: This torrent is basically a repackage of all the episodes that will fit on a standard 4.7 GB DVD. It will save you the trouble of having to search for and download each individual episode. They are all .avi files. Most newer DVD players will play .avi files. As soon as the season is over, or enough are shown to fit on another DVD, I will repackage them into a single torrent again.
